title: . CameraMain.java: fix to not show development mode if it has not been toggled…
- Added hidden development mode settings to allow showing the topcodes…

- Added hidden development mode settings to allow showing the topcodes validation process (thresholds) while scanning the answers
- Fixed mismatched Android build version and target SDK version

title: Properly defining the MIME type for the answers log file ("text/csv") to avoid…
message:
Properly defining the MIME type for the answers log file ("text/csv") to avoid trying to share it through applications not supporting this content type.

Removing unused added methods on "TopCodes.java".

title: Changing Topcodes.draw() method to not use Canvas.drawArc() which is not working…
message: Changing Topcodes.draw() method to not use Canvas.drawArc() which is not working on Android M, causing  topcodes generation failure.
